goserver.game.board

Class StoneGroupSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • goserver.game.board.StoneGroupSet

  • public class StoneGroupSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all StoneGroups and handles updating them.
    Author:
    mk

      Finds the StoneGroup to which given Field belongs.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        private StoneGroup find(Field field)
        Finds the StoneGroup to which given Field belongs.
        Parameters:
        field - Field to find the group.
        Returns:
        StoneGroup to which given Field belongs

      • updateGroupsAfterMove

        public java.util.HashSet<Field> updateGroupsAfterMove(Field lastMove)
        Updates StoneGroups after a move. Adds a newly put stone to a group and handles consequences of a move, i.e. captured stones.
        Parameters:
        lastMove - Field where a stone was recently put.
        Returns:
        HashSet of Fields made empty after lastMove.

      • handleConsequences

        private java.util.HashSet<Field> handleConsequences(Field lastMove)
        Handles consequences of a move, i.e. removes groups of stones with no liberties.
        Parameters:
        lastMove - Field, which was lastly changed.
        Returns:
        HashSet of Fields from which stones were removed.

      • createNewGroup

        private void createNewGroup(Field field)
        Creates a new StoneGroup with given Field and updates set of groups.
        Parameters:
        field -

      • joinGroups

        private StoneGroup joinGroups(StoneGroup destination,
                              StoneGroup source)
        Copies all fields from source to destination and updates set of groups.
        Parameters:
        destination - StoneGroup to which fields will be copied.
        source - StoneGroup from which fields will be copied.
        Returns:
        StoneGroup which is given destination with new elements added from source.

      • addFieldToGroup

        public void addFieldToGroup(Field field)
        Adds a field to adjacent StoneGroup. If given field should belong to more than one group, joins the group. If there are no adjacent groups, creates a new group for given field.
        Parameters:
        field - Field to add to StoneGroup

      • checkForKo

        public Field checkForKo(Field move)
        Checks if the ko rule would be violated if a move to given Field was made.
        Parameters:
        move - Field where a player wants to put a stone.
        Returns:
        Field which would be captured after given move or null if none or more than one field would be captured.

      • checkIfSuicidal

        public boolean checkIfSuicidal(Field move)
        Checks if move to given Field would cause immediate capture of added stone.
        Parameters:
        move - Field on which player wants to put a stone.
        Returns:
        true if move is suicidal, false otherwise.
